title: Personal Accident
description: Get the affordable personal accident insurance coverage you deserve. With Beirut Life, worry-free since you are covered while on the journey. We offer you coverage for car accidental death, permanent disability, passive war risk and hospital cash benefits.
sumInsuredRemark: USD 50 paid in cash as hospital benefits for a max of 15 days
covers: Total Permanent Disability due to Accident - TPD
Hospital Cash Benefit for a max of 15 days
